question: Which genes predict resistance to R-CHOP Regimen in Diffuse Large B-cell Lymphoma?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('R-CHOP Regimen')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('R-CHOP Regimen'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('R-CHOP Regimen')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'diffuse' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'large' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'b-cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lymphoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Vemurafenib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Vemurafenib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Vemurafenib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'skin' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'melanoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Sunitinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Sunitinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'renal' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: List genes associated with resistance to Panobinostat in Malignant Tumor Of The Breast.

    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'acute' AND

  )

  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,

  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,

  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Nelarabine')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Nelarabine'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Nelarabine')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 't-cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'acute' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lymphoblastic' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: Which genes predict resistance to Sunitinib in Primary Cancer?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Sunitinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Sunitinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Sunitinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cancer'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Atezolizumab'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Atezolizumab')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cancer'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: Which genes confer resistance to Dasatinib in B Lymphoblastic Leukemia/lymphoma?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Dasatinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Dasatinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Dasatinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'b-lymphoblastic' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia/lymphoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,

  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: Which genes confer resistance to Venetoclax in Lymphoid Cancer?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Venetoclax')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Venetoclax'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Venetoclax')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lymphoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Nilutamide')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Nilutamide'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Nilutamide')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'prostate'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Infigratinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Infigratinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Infigratinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'transitional' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Sonidegib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Sonidegib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Sonidegib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'basal' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Ionizing Radiotherapy')
)

    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cervical'
  )

    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  toLower(t.name) = toLower('PLX4720')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('PLX4720'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('PLX4720')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'childhood' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'low-grade' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'glioma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,

RETURN

question: What genes are resistance biomarkers for Cisplatin in Non-small Cell Lung Cancer?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Cisplatin')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Cisplatin'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Cisplatin')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Trametinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Trametinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'pancreatic'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: What genes are resistance biomarkers for Not Applicable in ETV6-RUNX1?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Not Applicable')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Not Applicable'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Not Applicable')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'b-lymphoblastic' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia/lymphoma' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'with' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'etv6-runx1'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Lestaurtinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Lestaurtinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Lestaurtinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'acute' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'myeloid' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Mitogen-Activated Protein Kinase Kinase Inhibitor')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Mitogen-Activated Protein Kinase Kinase Inhibitor'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Mitogen-Activated Protein Kinase Kinase Inhibitor')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'pancreatic'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Erlotinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Erlotinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Erlotinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'mesothelioma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: List genes associated with resistance to Sunitinib in Stromal Tumor Of Gastrointestinal Tract.
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Sunitinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Sunitinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Sunitinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'gastrointestinal' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'stromal' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'tumor'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Docetaxel'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Docetaxel')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'gastric' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'adenocarcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)

  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,

LIMIT 100

cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Dasatinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Dasatinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Dasatinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cancer'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Gemcitabine'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Gemcitabine')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'childhood' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'acute' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lymphocytic' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL

RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,

  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'myeloid' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,

question: Which genes predict resistance to ALK Inhibitor TAE684 in Non-small Cell Lung Cancer?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('ALK Inhibitor TAE684')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('ALK Inhibitor TAE684'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('ALK Inhibitor TAE684')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: Which genes predict resistance to Cabozantinib in Lung Non-small Cell Carcinoma?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Cabozantinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Cabozantinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Cabozantinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Alectinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Cisplatin/Pembrolizumab/Pemetrexed Regimen')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Cisplatin/Pembrolizumab/Pemetrexed Regimen'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Cisplatin/Pembrolizumab/Pemetrexed Regimen')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: Which genes predict resistance to Paclitaxel in Non-small Cell Lung Cancer?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Paclitaxel')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Paclitaxel'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Paclitaxel')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: What genes are resistance biomarkers for Selpercatinib in Malignant Tumor?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Selpercatinib')

  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Selpercatinib')
)

UNWIND pmids AS p

RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Etoposide'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Etoposide')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'ovarian'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('MDM2 Inhibitor AMGMDS3'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('MDM2 Inhibitor AMGMDS3')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'ewing' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'sarcoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: What genes are resistance biomarkers for Doxorubicin in Chronic Lymphatic Leukaemia?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Doxorubicin')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Doxorubicin'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Doxorubicin')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'chronic' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lymphocytic' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: Which genes predict resistance to Trastuzumab Emtansine in Her2-receptor Positive Breast Cancer?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Trastuzumab Emtansine')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Trastuzumab Emtansine'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Trastuzumab Emtansine')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'her2-receptor' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'positive' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'breast'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Apalutamide'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Apalutamide')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'prostate'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Fluorouracil'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Fluorouracil')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'esophageal'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'

  )

  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p

RETURN

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Olaparib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Olaparib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cancer'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: What genes are resistance biomarkers for Palbociclib in Alveolar Childhood Rhabdomyosarcoma?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)

)

AND (

    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'rhabdomyosarcoma'

UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,

  'resistance' AS effect,

  pmids

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('SU5614')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('SU5614'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('SU5614')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'acute' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'myeloid' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('PI3Ka/Di')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('PI3Ka/Di'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('PI3Ka/Di')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'breast'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Lenvatinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Lenvatinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Lenvatinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'hepatocellular' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: List genes associated with resistance to Trastuzumab in Gastric Adenocarcinoma.
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Trastuzumab')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Trastuzumab'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Trastuzumab')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'gastric' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'adenocarcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Vemurafenib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Vemurafenib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'pancreatic'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  toLower(t.name) = toLower('PLX4720')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('PLX4720'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('PLX4720')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'skin' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'melanoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('MDM2 Inhibitor AMGMDS3')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cancer'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Ribociclib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Ribociclib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'alveolar' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'rhabdomyosarcoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100
